author: raghushantha
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

- On a Ubuntu 16.04 machine, deploy PSCore 6.1.0 preview 2
- Configure omi client to use spnego-ntlmv2 as per instructions:
https://github.com/Microsoft/omi/blob/master/Unix/doc/setup-ntlm-omi.md
- Ensure $env:NTLM_USER_FILE env var is missing or incorrectly configured
- Try remoting to any Windows target (Invoke-Command / Enter-PSSession) -Authentication Negotiate

```powershell

```

Expected behavior
-----------------
- Invoke-Command / Enter-PSSession fail and control returns to user
```none

```

Actual behavior
---------------
- Invoke-Command / Enter-PSSession hangs indefinitely
- Note: This is a blocker for CloudShell - if the user's environment is incorrectly configured, Shell hangs and needs to be restarted.
```none

```

----------------
